name: Minet
description:
Mewello !

In Minet, you're a dwarf grandma mining cats !

You'll have to go deeper and deeper in order to discover the rarest cats, and sell them to a high price !

You’ll have to manage a short living battery, that helps you light your way and power an elevator to go down faster. When it dies, the cats escape ! So get back to the elevator before it runs out.

Finally, use your earnings to improve your battery and your pickaxe, and go even deeper !

Mew Mew
